Title: Relates to the attorney general's ability to protect New Yorkers from unfair, deceptive and abusive business practices; repealer
Summary: Relates to the attorney general's ability to protect New Yorkers from unfair, deceptive and abusive business practices.
LawCode: Rpld §348, §349 sub (b) ¶(3), amd §349, Gen Bus L (as proposed in S.8416 & A.8427-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the attorney general's ability to protect New Yorkers from unfair, deceptive and abusive business practices; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
